data.actual_result: Emoji picker highlights the category but doesn't jump to it
data.expected_result: Emoji picker immediately jumps to the category you picked
data.short_description: Tapping on a category in the emoji search after having no search results doesn't jump to that category
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any server - Open the emoji picker - Open the search feature of the emoji picker - Type random text to get no search results - Tap the search button on the keyboard to lower the keyboard - Tap on one of the categories on the right, and observe the emoji picker
